title: Harman Singh
text:
Hello! My name is Harman Singh and I am a graduate student in the Department of Geography at Penn State University, U.S.A. I am pursuing a Dual-title Ph.D.Â in Geography and Climate Science researching urban floods in India from a human-environment and hydrometeorology perspective.
I earned my B.Sc. in Geography with a minor in Sustainability Leadership from Penn State University in 2021.

title: Teaching
text:
Research plays a central role in my teaching as students improve their analytical skills and master core concepts of geography through hands-on experience.I have been a teaching assistant for courses that focus on research, geography, statistics, and sustainability.
